channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Majority of Latin Americans Endorsed Trump’s Intervention In Venezuela, Polls Show
item.description: Several polls show that a majority of Latin Americans who were questioned endorsed the intervention, suggesting a shift, at least for now, from ideolo...

item.title: How North Carolina erased medical debt for 2.5 million people
item.description: The state partnered with a nonprofit to wipe out the debts. It also has a plan in place to prevent medical debt for people in specific income brackets...

item.title: ChongLy Scott Thao, Hmong Immigrant and U.S. Citizen, Arrested by ICE
item.description: A Hmong immigrant, who is a U.S. citizen, was released after being questioned for an hour. Federal officials said they had been seeking sex offenders.

item.title: Widespread Winter Storm Is Forecast to Bring Heavy Snow to Central and Eastern US
item.description: People across a large section of the central and eastern United States are facing predictions for heavy snow and ice starting Friday.

item.title: 1 year into Trump's second term, a consumer watchdog agency is 'hanging by a thread'

item.title: Prince Harry Gives Emotional Testimony About Effects of U.K. News Coverage
item.description: Harry said in court that reading articles about him published by Associated Newspapers, which he has accused of acting unlawfully, had been “traumatic...

item.title: Taiwan’s $40 Billion Military Spending Plan Stalled by Political Impasse
item.description: Taiwan’s domestic gridlock is revealing a deep-seated fracture over how the island should defend itself and how much it can depend on the United State...

item.title: Greetings from Kalk Bay, a South African fishing village where wild seals await scraps
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.
